content: Though Red Loong can be found in Chapter 1, you'll actually **need to wait until Chapter 2 before you can access the secret boss.** Once you've collected the Loong Scales from Chapter 2, return to the Keeper's Shrine called Outside the Forest and head to the nearby waterfall. With the Scales in your possession, you can now enter the waterfall and fight Red Loong.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Chapter 1 Secrets" and the sub-section "Red Loong". The content is presented below:

Though Red Loong can be found in Chapter 1, you'll actually **need to wait until Chapter 2 before you can access the secret boss.** Once you've collected the Loong Scales from Chapter 2, return to the Keeper's Shrine called Outside the Forest and head to the nearby waterfall. With the Scales in your possession, you can now enter the waterfall and fight Red Loong.
